name: KCXZ Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .kcxz extension has been renamed and encrypted by KCXZ ransomware . It contains an image, document, or other file the ransomware is holding hostage. The .kcxz extension is appended to the file's normal extension, producing a compound extension like .jpg.kcxz .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
